harrys-ecommerce.title: Harry's Boutique: Ecommerce
harrys-ecommerce.description: Complete e-commerce platform for Harry's Boutique, specializing in pet fashion.
harrys-ecommerce.fullDescription: Comprehensive development of an elegant and functional online store for Harry's Boutique, specializing in pet clothing and accessories. The platform offers a smooth shopping experience with customized interfaces, subtle animations, advanced product filtering system, and complete connectivity with a custom-built backend.
features: Integrated payment gateway with MercadoPago for secure transactions
Performance optimization for fast page loading and smooth navigation
Advanced catalog with dynamic filters and smart search functionality
Persistent shopping cart with real-time updates
Responsive design adaptable to all devices and screen sizes
Complete user system with customized profiles, address management, and order tracking
Administrative dashboard with statistics, inventory management, and order control
Custom backend developed with Node.js and MongoDB for maximum flexibility
Infrastructure deployed on Vercel to ensure high availability
Product review and rating system to build customer trust

ikintsugi-theme.title: Ikintsugi Theme
ikintsugi-theme.description: Custom WordPress theme developed with Sage, implementing a client-provided design. Includes animations, responsive design, and high performance.
ikintsugi-theme.fullDescription: Custom WordPress theme developed from scratch for the Ikintsugi institution. Implemented with Sage, a starter theme that uses Laravel Blade and modern frontend tooling. The design was based on specifications provided by the client's designer, and was implemented with a focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience.
features: Exact implementation of client-provided Figma design
Fully responsive design for all screen sizes
Performance optimization with high PageSpeed score
Subtle animations to enhance user experience
Custom Gutenberg blocks configuration
Use of TailwindCSS for consistent and maintainable styles
Modern workflow with Vite for rapid development
Organized and reusable Blade templates
SEO optimization following best practices

plugin-reservas.title: Reservation Plugin for WooCommerce
plugin-reservas.description: Plugin that allows users to reserve products and administrators to keep a count of reservations by size and products.
plugin-reservas.fullDescription: WordPress plugin developed to extend WooCommerce, allowing customers to reserve products through a form, confirm reservation, be notified by email, and the administrator to manage all this data.
features: Effective subtotal counting
Multiple product system through form
Administration panel with statistics and filters
Automatic email notifications when reservation is made
Support for products with variations (sizes, colors, etc.)
Detailed statistics by products and variations
Data export to Excel
User and reservation management

plugin-waitlist.title: Waitlist Plugin for WooCommerce
plugin-waitlist.description: Plugin that allows users to subscribe to out-of-stock products in WooCommerce, with automatic notifications and a complete administration panel to manage subscriptions.
plugin-waitlist.fullDescription: WordPress plugin developed to extend WooCommerce, allowing customers to subscribe to out-of-stock products. The system manages automatic notifications when the product becomes available again and provides a complete administration panel to analyze subscriptions and product trends.
features: Integration with WooCommerce inventory
Subscription system for out-of-stock products
Administration panel with statistics and filters
Automatic email notifications when stock is replenished
Customizable email templates
Support for products with variations (sizes, colors, etc.)
Detailed statistics by product and variation
Data export to Excel
User and subscription management
Flexible system configuration

app-pedidos.title: Orders Application
app-pedidos.description: Web and mobile application made with Expo React Native and Firebase backend for order and product management.
app-pedidos.fullDescription: Cross-platform application developed with React Native and Expo that allows complete management of orders and products. Integrated with Firebase for real-time data storage, it offers a smooth experience on both mobile devices and web browsers.
features: Fully functional application on both mobile and desktop
Backend integration using Firebase
Complete CRUD for products
Management of orders, statuses, categories, quantities
Export orders to PDF or CSV
Addition of orders with multiple products and quantities

portfolio-2024.title: Portfolio 2024
portfolio-2024.description: My personal portfolio developed with Next.js and Tailwind CSS
portfolio-2024.fullDescription: Personal portfolio built with React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. This site showcases my projects, skills, and experience as a software developer. It implements a modern design with fluid animations using Framer Motion and a complete internationalization system.
features: Fully responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop
Fluid animations with Framer Motion
Light/dark mode adapted to system preferences
Internationalization with support for English and Spanish
RPG-type interactive dialogs for technologies
SEO and performance optimization

featuring.title: Featuring - App for Musicians
featuring.description: Mobile application to connect musicians and facilitate artistic collaborations. Includes posts, short videos, match system, profiles, and ratings.
featuring.fullDescription: Featuring is a mobile application developed with React Native and Expo, specifically designed for musicians looking to collaborate. The platform allows artists to connect, share musical content, collaborate, and receive ratings from the community. It includes a complete administration panel to manage the platform's content.
features: Profile system for artists with ratings and statistics
Post feed for sharing music and short videos
Match system based on musical preferences and filters
Collaborations between artists with mutual rating system
Integrated audio and video player
Push notifications for new interactions
Complete administration panel to manage content
Integration with currency APIs for international payments
Premium level with additional features
Content reporting and moderation system
